features: CAPTURES 99.97% OF ALLERGENS AND PARTICULATES* AND 99.9% OF VIRUSES AND BACTERIA.** With the Clorox Air Purifier, you can breathe easier. It has true HEPA filtration to capture 99.97%* of particles as small as 0.1 microns and 2 additional filters to capture larger particles and odors.

3 STAGE 360° FILTER: Delivers 360° air purification by capturing allergens, particulates, viruses and bacteria in 3 filter layers. The outside pre-filter catches large dust particles and pet hair, then the True HEPA filter captures 99.97%* of allergens and particulates and 99.9% of viruses and bacteria**. The active carbon filter reduces VOCs and odors to keep air smelling fresh.

ACCURATE AIR-QUALITY FEEDBACK. The air quality sensor provides real-time feedback with a PM2.5 digital display, a color-coded light from green/good to maroon/hazardous and by automatically adjusting the auto mode's fan speed in response to changes in the current air quality.

AUTO MODE KEEPS YOUR AIR CLEAN AROUND THE CLOCK. Select auto mode and walk away — it automatically adjusts to the ideal fan speed in response to changes in your air quality detected by the air quality sensor.

IDEAL FOR LARGE ROOMS. The 360° airflow pulls in air from all directions to clean rooms up to 5 times per hour when used in a room 320 sq. ft. and 1 time an hour when used in a room up to 1,500 sq. ft.****
WHAT’S INCLUDED. 1 Clorox Large Room Air Purifier and 1 Clorox True HEPA Filter that lasts 6-12 months.

GENUINE CLOROX FILTERS: Replace the filter every 6-12 months by searching for B099XVM38X or Clorox 12010 Large Room Replacement Filter. Maintain optimal performance with True HEPA filtration to capture 99.97%* of particles as small as 0.1 microns and 2 additional filters to capture larger particles and odors.
Testing performed by independent third-party, LMS Technologies, INC, August 31, 2021

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: When it counts, Trust Clorox Clorox, a leading household cleaning brand, is expanding beyond surface disinfection with innovations in air care. This new line of premium air purifiers help everyone breathe easier at home. They reduce viruses and bacteria from the air and help protect your family from allergens, pet dander, dust and smoke. Clorox Large Room Air Purifier, True HEPA Filter, up to 1,500 Sq. Ft. Capacity The 360° airflow pulls in air from all directions to clean rooms up to 5 times per hour when used in a room 320 sq. ft. and 1 time an hour when used in a room up to 1,500 sq. ft.**** This large room air purifier will help you protect your family from allergens, pet dander, dust, smoke, viruses, bacteria and more. It captures 99.97% of allergens and particulates* and reduces viruses and bacteria** so you can breathe easier. PM2.5 air quality sensor accurately monitors your air quality around the clock. Air quality light provides real-time feedback with 6 color coded levels of air quality. No need to worry, when set to AUTO mode the air purifier self-adjusts fan speeds based on air quality. Delivers 360° air purification by capturing allergens, particulates, viruses and bacteria in 3 filter layers. Includes 1 Clorox filter that lasts 6-12 months*** Testing performed by independent third-party, LMS Technologies, INC, August 31, 2021

Clorox Large Room Air Purifier (11010) Clorox Large Room True HEPA Replacement Filter (12010) Clorox Medium Room Air Purifier (11030) Clorox Tabletop Air Purifier (11020) Clorox Extra Large Room Air Purifier (11060) Coverage Area 1,500 sq. ft. 1,500 sq. ft. 1,000 sq. ft. 200 sq. ft. 2,200 sq. ft. True HEPA Filter ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Speeds 4 4 3 4 Timer 1, 4 & 8 Hours 1, 4 & 8 Hours 2, 4 & 8 Hours 1, 4 & 8 Hours Compatible With 12010 11010, 11011 12030 12020 12060

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best purchase this year
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with this air purifier. The reviews were good, the cost was reasonable, and it works. I have definitely noticed a reduction in stale odor as well as dust since purchasing this. It’s also extremely quiet. It’s also small enough to tuck into an unobtrusive yet functional space. My neighbor purchased two as a result of my recommendation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This purifier runs silent and is perfect for a dusty environment like a work office. Practically no set up required. Just plug it in and turn it on. Filter can be removed and be blown out with an air hose and be reused so that you don’t need to buy expensive replacement filters like so many other models. Recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this air purifier for my bedroom hoping to help me sleep better without waking up with so much sinus discomfort. It has worked well and I like that you can choose auto settings to let the purifier determine when it needs to come on, or you can choose yourself to turn it on and off when you want.It seems to have really helped! Sleeping better! The LED reading on top will show what your current air quality is, when you need to change your filter, and you can choose to dim the panel display. The unit is quiet enough and doesn't disturb our sleep. Happy to have this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Loved how well this Chlorox air purifier works! Very quiet except when on highest setting, great size and price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value. A keeper!
reviews.reviewText: I bought 3 other purifiers before deciding on this one. One was a mini tabletop one that ended up just not having enough power, and the other 2 had a weird motor noise/rattle that I couldn’t get past. I am sensitive to sounds so it was important I ended up with either a silent purifier or one where sound wasn’t annoying.-The indicator works very well. If I cook or light a candle it senses it quickly and the fan turns up as needed.It is surprisingly good at filtering odors. This seems to be hit or miss with air purifiers. The filter has an activated carbon layer that does not look thick but seems to work. I have this next to a litter box cabinet and it does a good job at filtering out the odors. Granted I do a good a job at keeping it clean, but I do notice an improvement.-Finally, the noise. The low setting is pretty quiet. You can hear it in a quiet room but almost any competing sound will drown it out. I keep it in a 10x10 guest bedroom/office. In a quiet room it’s a nice quiet white noise. The next level up just sounds like a little louder version of the white noise. It’s a typical fan noise.For under $100 (for medium) it’s tough to beat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars CLEAN AIR, Hopefully?
reviews.reviewText: This was supposed to be a NEW purchase of this air purifier. Evident that this was an open box return, absolutely NO documentation/manual/warranty information etc. The box was re-taped, and the bag over the unit was torn and not taped. The purifier/manufacturer box was placed in an Amazon shipping box over TWICE as large as the item box, with ABSOLUTELY NO PACKING/PROTECTION!! It was a major miracle the the item was delivered without any apparent damage, only damage to the outer box. AMAZON, BE BETTER THAN THIS!!! Your shipping people suck! Do not know if the unit functions normally, it did power up, but has not changed on auto run for over 2 hours so far. The unit is pretty quiet on the lower 2 (of 4) fan settings, when on Auto, it defaults to the lowest speed until the air quality sensors detect impurities and kick the speed up (or so I'm told). Will try to update this review with an actual performance review.Three week update:After all the reservations above, this air purifier has become one of our favorite appliances in our home.It quietly goes about its job, and does a great job cleaning our air!Last weekend we cooked hamburgers on our kitchen range, and the unit kicked up to speed 3, and the light changed from green to red (in the living room). After about an hour it started slowing down, and by the next morning it was back to low speed (on Auto). Food smell was gone. We even bought a desktop air quality monitor to check the reading on the unit, it tracked pretty closely! Review for the unit function and operation is now 5 stars! Might get one for the basement too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This unit is amazing!
reviews.reviewText: This unit is wonderful! It operates silently in the background and keeps the air fresh and clean. What amazed me is when we cooked bacon in the background it cleaned the air and removed the heavy grease from the air so quickly!! Highly recommend it!! Much better than any previous units I had!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This air purifier is easy to set up. It does a wonderful job and very quite.
Llego incompleto no lo puedo usar

reviews.reviewTitle: SErious bang for the buck and works Great!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this during wildfire season in BC. We also own some Medify air filtration units, but we bought this because it has an ion sensor and it is automatic.This system works GREAT! In automatic mode, its super quiet until the particle detector senses in increase. (like when we open the back door when its smoky or when we are frying something) As it senses more particles, it ramps up through various stages depending on how bad it is.Once the particle count does down, it ramps down again. (back to super quiet)Our other units are always on, and do not have sensors. So they burn through filters every three months. This only works when needed and once it's done its job, it gets quiet again. Saying that, its still not as loud as our MA-25 at high speed.So I definitely recommend this unit. Its keeping our air clean on our main floor (open plan) and it was very reasonably priced considering its firepower. The next time we need to buy filters for our other units, we may just buy another one of these instead.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect for a small home office!!
reviews.reviewText: I've used this desktop air purifier for a couple of weeks, with all of the forest fire smoke in the air outside. I also use a portable AC in my home office, which does draw in some of the outside air as part of the cooling process. However, both units are great. The Clorox air purifier is super quiet. We've decided today to order the next larger model to address the air quality throughout our 1,100 sq foot condo. Thank you, Clorox, for a great product!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Unable to add device to Alexa App
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this item from Amazon UK. The item was shipped from the US and I received it a week in advance which was great. I unpacked it and followed the instructions which as quite straight forward to add it as a device to the Alexa app only to find that the Clorox Brand is not an available brand to select when adding it as an Air Purifier device. I've added the photos of the instructions and a screenshot of the available brands in the Alexa app to show that it's not available. I contacted Alexa Customer Service and they told me I need to contact Clorox. By this stage I'd spent about 4 hours trying to connect the device to Alexa which was a bit frustrating so I'll be returning it as I can't connect it to Alexa.
